DataElement.preferredName: Pediatric Quality of Life Brain Tumor Module Version 1.0 Movement and Balance Scaled Score Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of the Movement and Balance Scaled Score for the Pediatric Quality of Life Brain Tumor Module.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Pediatric Quality of Life Brain Tumor Module Version 1.0 Movement and Balance Subscale Scaled Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A quality of life questionnaire designed to measure health-related quality of life in a pediatric brain tumor patient. It is derived from the Pediatric Quality of Life Inventory Generic Core Scales._A subscale of the Pediatric Quality of Life Brain Tumor Module designed to assess issues associated with movement and balance._Conversion of a raw score on a test to a common scale that allows for a numerical comparison.
